Plotting¶

plotting.plot_wavelet_maps(f, L, B, J_min, dirs=1, spin=0, same_scale=True, **map_args)¶

Plots the scaling and wavelet maps of f. Assumes f is a MW map bandlimited at L. If same_scale=True, wavelet maps are plotted on same colour scale map_args is a dictionary of the optional arguments for plot_map. Returns list of figures
